attributes.action: allow Rose Gentle into the Chilcott Iraq Inquiry when Tony Blair testifies, Rose lost her son in Iraq and has campaigned for 5 years for an Inquiry to take place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From Rose Gentle: "Ever since the death of my son Gordon in Iraq in 2004 I have been campaigning for a real inquiry in to how Blair and the government got us in to this war. I have written numerous times to Tony Blair asking for a meeting. My requests have been ignored or denied. I think it is disgraceful that you are now trying to bar me from the hearing that I have sought for so long. It is a decision I cannot accept. I am concerned that it may be that I have been excluded because I have campaigned so publicly for more than five years for this inquiry."

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Iraq Inquiry, which is independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
